mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select dongName, bjdCode dongCode from dongcode where left(bjdCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select distinct d.dong, d.guguncode, d.buildyear, d.name, d.jibun, g.gugunName, a.aptCode from deal_data d left join apartment a on d.dong = a.dong and d.name = a.aptName join guguncode g on d.guguncode = left(g.guguncode, 5) where d.dong = #{dong} and d.guguncode = #{gugunCode} and d.guguncode = left(g.guguncode, 5);
select area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, deposit, rentmoney, dealamount, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun from deal_data where dong = #{dong} and jibun = #{jibun} limit 0, 8

select distinct d.dong dong, d.guguncode guguncode, d.buildyear buildyear, d.name name, d.jibun jibun, f.gugunName gugunname from favoritehouse f, deal_data d where f.userid = #{userid} and f.name = d.name and f.jibun = d.jibun
mapper.insert: insert into favoritehouse (userid, name, gugunname, dong, jibun) values (#{userid}, #{name}, #{gugunname}, #{dong}, #{jibun})
mapper.delete: delete from favoritehouse where userid = #{userid} and name = #{name}
mapper.select: select f.dong, f.gugunname, f.jibun, f.name, a.aptCode from favoritehouse f left join apartment a on f.dong = a.dong and f.name = a.aptName where userid = #{userid} and gugunname = #{gugunname}
select a.aptCode aptCode, b.aptAddr aptAddress from apartment a, aptbasic b where a.aptName = #{name} and a.dong = #{dong} and a.aptCode = b.aptCode

select area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, deposit, rentmoney, dealamount, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun from deal_data where dong = #{dong} and name = #{name} order by dealmonth desc, dealday desc limit 0, 3
select max(convenience) convenience, max(education) education, max(traffic) traffic, max(publicfac) publicfac, max(medical) medical from chart
select avg(convenience) convenience, avg(education) education, avg(traffic) traffic, avg(publicfac) publicfac, avg(medical) medical from chart
mapper.insert: insert into chart (name, lat, lng, convenience, education, traffic, publicfac, medical) values (#{name}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{convenience}, #{education}, #{traffic}, #{publicFac}, #{medical})
